name: SCP 173 - Nightshift Survival Breach Containment
description:
SCP 173 - Nightshift Survival Breach Containment is undoubtedly one of the best horror games to ever hit the App Store. Unbelievable graphics and an amazing experience all combined into one game!

You are the night watcher, survive the nights!
- Every day has a new achievement to find out!
- Catch the beast before it catches you!
- Use your flashlight to defend yourself!

- The newest addition to the iOS horror stable is also the most faithful to classic horror games of yesteryear. - PocketGames
